thread.title: This UP Girl, Thrashing Her Molesters With A Police Baton, Is The Most Satisfying Thing You Will See Today
thread.title_full: This UP Girl, Thrashing Her Molesters With A Police Baton, Is The Most Satisfying Thing You Will See Today

title: This UP Girl, Thrashing Her Molesters With A Police Baton, Is The Most Satisfying Thing You Will See Today
text:
facebook 
On Sunday, a girl decided to take matters in her own hand by lashing at her molesters with a police baton in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. 
It’s ironic that this incident comes at the heels of the appointment of Yogi Adityanath as the CM of the state, whose comments in the past have done a disservice to women at large. While a good part of the country has vehemently shown disapproval on BJP’s decision on social media, this act of courage single-handedly instils hope. Especially for women across the country who have faced similar kind of harassment. 
This incident took place near Gautam Pali police station, where a group of girls were being teased by men riding on bikes. From what we can make from the video, one of the girls went on to snatch the baton from the cop and started hitting the ever-teasers. In flat 14 seconds, this girl winds up as the ultimate inspiration. #Watch Girl thrashed molesters with police's baton in Lucknow's Gautam Palli area, Uttar Pradesh (19.03.2017) pic.twitter.com/aB0Ld1AEHc
